name: Altaria
description: The Humming Pokémon. Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokémon is cured of negative status ailments upon returning to its Pokeball.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather-related abilities have no effect on the Pokémon that have them.
